translation.en: That girl. Zoey. Let's take her.

translation.es: Así que debemos encontrar la forma de mantenernos ocupados.

This dirty thing with no screen?
-[in English] Please, I love you. -[Dike] I don't love you.
translation.es: - Por favor, te amo. - Yo no te amo.

translation.en: -Oh, please, I beg. -Don't follow me. Go!
translation.es: - Te lo ruego. - No me sigas. ¡Vete!

translation.en: -Kung fu! Kung fu! -Kung fu! Kung fu! -[boys grunting]
[speaking native language] It's garbage. All of you go away!
It's an imagination TV! How can you say it's garbage?
translation.es: ¡Es televisión imaginaria! ¿Cómo puedes decir que es basura?

My father is saying, "Outside, people are suffering,
translation.es: Mi padre dice: Afuera, la gente sufre,

translation.en: That is why so many refugees are coming here small-small.
translation.es: Por eso, de a poco van llegando muchos refugiados.

translation.en: [speaking English] Master, master, please, will you buy this TV?
How am I supposed to watch this?
The Nigerians are keeping the peace.
[Agu] They are always buying things, so they are easy to be selling to.
translation.es: Siempre compran cosas, así que es fácil venderles.

translation.en: Okay. How much for this treasure?
Huh? Three thousand. Too much! Thousand five.
Oh, no, no, no, no. Thousand five.
-[Dike] Some food, some food. -Bring out some of your food and take it.
translation.es: - Algo de comida. - Traiga comida y se la lleva.

translation.en: Uche, bring the foods and come.
translation.es: Uche, trae los alimentos y ven.

translation.en: [Agu] I am a good boy from a good family.
translation.es: Soy un buen chico de una buena familia.

translation.en: My mother is always working hard for us.
translation.es: Mi madre trabaja mucho para mantenernos.

translation.en: Who can tell me where lions live?
[Agu] I like my father more now that he's not my teacher.
translation.es: Prefiero a mi padre ahora que no es mi maestro.

translation.en: [Agu] Since the war, he is a busy man.
translation.es: Desde la guerra, está muy ocupado.

translation.en: He is using some of our land
so that the refugees can be making a new village.
translation.es: para que los refugiados construyan una nueva aldea.

translation.en: [father speaking native language] What we need now is medicine.
He is more concerned with his muscles and his hair.
translation.es: Está más preocupado por sus músculos y su cabello.

translation.en: Sometimes I am adding to his soaps.
When I get a hold of you...
I was trying to make it warmer for you!
You're lucky I don't shit on you.
translation.es: Tienes suerte de que no te cagara encima.

translation.en: I'm gonna fart on your face.
translation.es: Voy a pedorrearme en tu cara.

translation.en: [Agu speaking English] Big brother is also concerned with sleeping.
translation.es: A mi hermano mayor también le preocupa dormir.

translation.en: [speaking native language] I want to sleep with this girl before the war gets here.
translation.es: Quiero dormir con esta chica antes de que la guerra llegue aquí.

translation.en: [Agu] I am not liking his music.
[speaking native language] Let me go! I didn't do anything to deserve this!
translation.es: ¡Déjame salir! ¡No hice nada para merecer esto!

translation.en: I am not liking his dancing.
And how can that girl be sleeping if he is making so much noise?
translation.es: ¿Cómo va a dormir esa chica si él hace tanto ruido?

translation.en: [speaking native language] Let me go! I don't like this!
[pastor speaking native language] Treat your neighbor as your brother.
translation.es: Trata a tu prójimo como a tu hermano.
Y trata a la vendedora del mercado...

translation.en: as your mother or older sister.
translation.es: ...como a tu madre o tu hermana mayor.

translation.en: [Agu in English] My mother is always saying, "If you do not know what to be doing,
translation.es: Mi madre siempre dice: Si no sabes qué hacer,

translation.en: you can always be asking God for the answer."
translation.es: siempre puedes pedirle la respuesta a Dios.

translation.en: [pastor] Choir, give us a song and then we'll continue.
translation.es: Coro, cántennos una canción, luego continuaremos.

translation.en: [Agu speaking English] God is liking music more than just talking.
translation.es: A Dios le gusta la música más que los sermones.

translation.en: So if you are singing and dancing, then he will be listening to us well-well.
translation.es: Así que si cantamos y bailamos, nos prestará más atención.

translation.en: [big brother in native language] Cut that branch.
Just hold on tight and cut it.
Have your lazy friend do it.
translation.es: Que lo haga el vago de tu amigo.

translation.en: He's the driver. Cut that one.
If I was a taxi driver, I'd drive around it.
translation.es: Si fuera chofer de taxi, la rodearía.

translation.en: We've been working all day. Give us some money for our work.
translation.es: Estuvimos trabajando todo el día. Páganos.

translation.en: Why did you block the road?
We are trying to fix it.

translation.es: ¿Por qué los niños son tan irrespetuosos?

translation.en: Curse yourself, standing in the middle of the road.
translation.es: Maldita seas, por estar en medio del camino.

translation.en: You stole my land! Me, an old woman!
translation.es: ¡Le robaron la tierra a una anciana!

translation.en: The devil will bless you one by one!
translation.es: ¡El diablo los bendecirá uno por uno!

translation.en: The lights are on, but nobody is home.
translation.es: Las luces están encendidas, pero no hay nadie en casa.

translation.en: [speaking native language] We saw that witch woman today. She said we were thieves.
translation.es: Hoy vimos a esa bruja. Dijo que éramos ladrones.
Dios se apoderó de su mente.

translation.en: The land we gave to the refugees...
translation.es: La tierra que le dimos a los refugiados...

translation.en: has been in our family since before your grandfather.
translation.es: ...está en nuestra familia desde antes que tu abuelo.

translation.en: I gave her a place, but she refused.
translation.es: Le ofrecí un lugar, pero ella lo rechazó.

translation.en: Who did this to my TV?
translation.es: ¿Quién le hizo eso a mi televisor?

translation.en: [speaking native language] If I acted like you when I was your age, Dad would've beaten me.
translation.es: Si a tu edad me comportaba como tú, papá me hubiera dado una paliza.
Tienes suerte de que estemos en guerra.

translation.en: It's not luck, everybody loves me.
translation.es: No es suerte, todos me aman.

translation.en: [big brother] Do you think she likes me?
When she sees these muscles, she'll fall in love with me.
translation.es: Cuando ella vea estos músculos, se enamorará de mí.

translation.en: [reporter speaking English on radio] It would seem things are changing quickly within the interim government.
translation.es: Parecería que las cosas cambian rápidamente en el gobierno interino.

translation.en: As of this morning, the NRC junta moved to abolish all political parties,
translation.es: A partir de esta mañana, la junta del CRN decidió abolir los partidos políticos,

translation.en: further consolidating their control of the government
translation.es: con lo que consolida aún más su control del gobierno

translation.en: in the wake of the recent military coup.
commander-in-chief of the armed forces responsible for the junta,
translation.es: Comandante en Jefe de las fuerzas armadas responsables de la junta,

translation.en: stated in a recent press conference
translation.es: dijo hace poco en una conferencia de prensa

translation.en: that it was his intention to rid the southern regions of the PLF,
translation.es: que era su intención deshacerse de las regiones sur del FLP,

translation.en: who he accused of being financed and supported by foreign institutions.
translation.es: a quienes acusó de tener financiamiento y apoyo de instituciones extranjeras.

translation.en: He also condemned the Native Defense Force militias,
translation.es: También condenó a las milicias de las Fuerzas de Defensa Nativa,

translation.en: who he said presented a threat to the very fabric of national security.
translation.es: a quienes consideró una amenaza a las bases de la seguridad nacional.

translation.en: Sangania went on to promise that the junta would accomplish
translation.es: Sangania prometió que la junta lograría

translation.en: what the previous regime had failed to do.
translation.es: lo que el régimen anterior no había podido lograr.

translation.en: Speculation on the collaboration between the armed forces and the PLF rebels...
translation.es: Se especula sobre una colaboración entre las FF.AA. y los rebeldes del FLP...

translation.en: [Chief Priest speaking native language] The NRC broke the agreement.
Now they want us to run away and leave our town.
translation.es: Ahora quieren que huyamos y abandonemos nuestro pueblo.

translation.en: Our ancestors have lived here, taken care of it, and left it for us.
translation.es: Nuestros ancestros vivieron aquí, la cuidaron, y nos la dejaron.

translation.en: It's our duty to protect it...
and leave it for our children.
So we should send the women and little children away...
translation.es: Deberíamos enviar lejos a las mujeres y los niños pequeños...

translation.en: And we who call ourselves men will stay and protect our town.
translation.es: Los hombres deberíamos quedarnos a proteger nuestro pueblo.

translation.en: Who is going to take care of the property we are leaving behind?
translation.es: ¿Quién se ocupará de las propiedades que dejaremos?

translation.en: Let me go, it's my duty.
We will be crushed between the rebels and the army! It is so bad!
translation.es: ¡Entre el ejército y los rebeldes, nos aplastarán! ¡Esto es terrible!

translation.en: [father speaking native language] We've already decided what to do with the children.
translation.es: Ya decidimos qué hacer con los niños.

translation.en: He is old. We can't take him anywhere.
translation.es: Él es grande. No podemos llevarlo a cualquier parte.

translation.en: You aren't listening to what I'm saying.
translation.es: No estás escuchando lo que digo.

translation.en: Go to your sister in the city, I'll meet you once everything is okay here.
translation.es: Busca a tu hermana en la ciudad, iré cuando todo se solucione.

translation.en: You want me to be a refugee in my own country?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que me refugie en mi propio país?

translation.en: With three small children and no husband?
translation.es: ¿Con tres hijos pequeños y sin marido?

translation.en: I'm not asking you, I'm telling you.
translation.es: No te lo estoy pidiendo, te lo ordeno.

translation.en: There are bigger issues to take care of--
translation.es: Hay problemas más graves que resolver...

translation.en: He's sending you because you're a little baby.
translation.es: Te deja ir porque eres un bebé.

translation.en: Now turn it on and you'll feel better.
What kind of face is that?
Your face is like a monkey's butt.
translation.es: Tu cara parece el trasero de un mono.

translation.en: [speaking native language] Come on! Come on! Come on! Hurry up!
Citizens of the republic, living in the buffer zone.
The National Reformation Council recommend non-combatants
translation.es: El Consejo de Reforma Nacional recomienda a los no combatientes

translation.en: to leave the buffer zone immediately...
This one's full. There's another here.
Is it heavy? Give it to me.
[man in English] Move back. Go back.
Please, please, I am the Section Chief. This is my family. There must be space.
translation.es: Por favor, soy el jefe de sección. Es mi familia. Tiene que haber lugar.

translation.en: This one woman and this small-small children.
[taxi driver] Where are you thinking this woman and child would be fitted?

translation.en: They're gonna be sitting in the front with you.
No, no, no, no, no. Seventy thousand, no boy.

-Seventy thousand, no boy. -[woman] Driver! Driver, driver!
Please, please, please. Hey, hey. With the boy!

There's no other way! Get in!
Remember to pray to God everyday.
[father] You're with the men now, keep quiet.

[speaking native language] Go take the clothes out of the rain.

I am seeing the rainy season in my village.
translation.es: veo la temporada de lluvias en mi aldea.

translation.en: You can be finding the ground is washing away beneath your feet.

[villager] No faction. [father] We are not fighters.

translation.es: - ¿Son de las Fuerzas de Defensa Nativa?
- ¿Son de las Fuerzas de Defensa Nativa? - No.

-[in English] Do you know these men?
-[in English] Do you know these men? -Master, master, master, please. Please.

I sentence you to immediate and summary execution.
translation.es: Los sentencio a una ejecución sumaria e inmediata.
Los sentencio a una ejecución sumaria e inmediata. Mátenlos.

translation.en: -I'm gonna kill you, man! -This is not the right place.
translation.es: - ¡Voy a matarte! - Este no es el lugar.
CO Hope, tomen a su hombre.

[soldier 2] Everybody move! Here comes the Commandant.
You get out of the fucking way!
What is this thing doing here?
Who is responsible for bringing this thing?

translation.en: Strika, is it you that is bringing this thing?
So all of you grown men,
it is Strika, the small boy, that is finding this prisoner.
translation.es: fue Strika, el niño, el que encontró a este prisionero.

translation.en: Two-I-C, what are we to be doing with this thing?
This thing? It is just a boy.
[Commandant] Does a boy have two eyes to see?
translation.es: - ¿Un niño tiene dos ojos para ver?
- ¿Un niño tiene dos ojos para ver? - ¡Dos ojos, señor!

translation.en: [Commandant] A boy has hands to strangle and fingers to pull triggers.

translation.en: Why you saying a boy is nothing? Huh?
translation.es: ¿Por qué dices que este niño no es nada?

translation.en: A boy is very, very dangerous. You understand me?

translation.en: Are you wanting to be eating this thing?
Oh, you have hands like a baby.
If you are telling me, I will be helping you.
translation.es: Si me lo dices, te ayudaré.

translation.en: You see, Strika is hungry. He will eat you.
The government army killed my father... and my big brother...
translation.es: El ejército del gobierno mató a mi padre y a mi hermano mayor,

translation.en: and my father told me to run... into the bush.
translation.es: mi padre me dijo que huyera y me escondiera en la maleza.

translation.en: Everybody here is calling me Commandant.
[soldier] How does the Commandant look? [all] All right, sir!
[soldier] How does the Commandant look? [all] All right, sir!
Now, what are they calling you?
Oh, you must say it like you are prouder!
that is what I will be calling you then, eh?
Leave this one under my charge. I will be training him to be a warrior.
translation.es: Dejen a este bajo mi mando. Lo entrenaré para que sea un guerrero.

translation.en: So you can be fighting the army that is killing your father.

translation.en: Is that what you want? You must be saying yes!
translation.es: ¿Es eso lo que quieres? ¡Debes decir sí!

translation.en: -One more time. Mmm-hmm. -One more time. Mmm-hmm. -Yes, sir!
Rambo, give this SBU some work.
translation.es: Rambo, dale trabajo a esta Unidad de niños pequeños.

translation.en: I saved your life. I saved your life.
[soldier 1] Move out! [soldier 1] Move out! [soldier 2] Move out!
[soldier] How our Commandant look? [all] All right, sir!

translation.es: - ¿Y el Comandante? - ¿Y el Comandante? - Muy bien.

translation.en: You are now under NDF control.
translation.es: Ahora están bajo el control de las FDN.

translation.en: If you're willing to stay, then stay.
translation.es: Si se quieren quedar, entonces quédense.
Pero deben cumplir con la iniciación.

translation.en: [Two-I-C] They are not understanding me, boys.
Show them what I'm talking about.
-[man] Raise-- Put up your fucking hands!
-[man] Raise-- Put up your fucking hands! -Check them. Check them. Make sure...
This baby boy is your responsibility now. Train him.
translation.es: Este bebé es tu responsabilidad ahora. Entrénalo.

translation.en: Come over! Fucking move! Let's move. Move. Move.
-Please, can I have some of the food? -Please, can I have some of the food? -[soldiers laughing]
You think you are soldier now, eh?
You's nothing. You're not doing nothing here.
translation.es: No eres nada. No haces nada aquí.
Cargué las municiones todo el día.

translation.en: You go back and stand on top of the chair.
translation.es: Ve allá y párate sobre esa silla.

translation.en: I said go and stand on top of the chair!
translation.es: ¡Dije que te pararas sobre esa silla!

translation.es: Lugarteniente, dile a Strika que venga a mi casa.

translation.en: [Two-I-C] CO Hope! Send Strika to Commandant!
translation.es: ¡Oficial Hope! ¡Envíen a Strika con el Comandante!

translation.en: [Preacher] Where you go get this thing from?
[CO Hope] Two-I-C tell me to train this boy.
translation.es: El Lugarteniente me dijo que lo entrenara.

translation.en: Show me position! Make sure you are clear. Move them, now!
translation.es: ¡Muéstrenme la posición! Asegúrense de que esté despejado. ¡Muévanlos!

translation.en: You stay together! You stay together!
Close the space. You're too far.
Where are you looking at? Where are you looking? Eh?
[Agu] God... I want to be seeing my mother again.
translation.es: Dios, quiero volver a ver a mi madre.

translation.en: Two-I-C is saying, small-small we are winning this war.
translation.es: El Lugarteniente dice que poco a poco ganaremos esta guerra.

translation.en: And then if you are willing, I can be finding her again.
translation.es: Y que si tú quieres, volveré a verla.
Pero eso solo tú lo sabes.

translation.en: [Two-I-C] The National Reformation Council took advantage of this instability
translation.es: El Consejo de Reforma Nacional se aprovechó de esta inestabilidad

translation.en: and militarily seized power to restore UPC dominance.
translation.es: y tomó el poder por la fuerza para restablecer el dominio del UPC.

translation.en: We NDF refuse to recognize this illegitimate government.
translation.es: Nosotros, las FDN, nos negamos a reconocer este gobierno ilegítimo.

translation.en: [Two-I-C] I said who are we? [all] We are NDF!
[Two-I-C] Our very own politicians, who steal our resources
translation.es: Nuestros propios políticos, que roban nuestros recursos

translation.en: and give them away for small-small dollar in exchange for private pay-offs,
translation.es: y los regalan por míseros dólares a cambio de arreglos privados,

translation.en: they are spit on the constitution!
They are spit on your rights!
They are trying to spit on your future!
I say, who is your Supreme Commandant?
-I say, who do you fight for?
-I say, who do you fight for? -[all] Dada Goodblood!
[Two-I-C] In the battlefield, you not be thinking normally.
translation.es: En el campo de batalla, no pensarán con normalidad.

translation.en: [Two-I-C] The only thing mattering is the mission of the NDF!
translation.es: ¡Lo único que importa es la misión de las FDN!

translation.en: -Soldiers, are you hearing me? -[all] Yes, sir!
You fight and kill anyone who destroys the peace.
translation.es: Luchen y maten a cualquiera que atente contra la paz.

translation.en: Offside, offside! That's what I saw. Offside, offside! Offside!
[Two-I-C] How does your Commandant look? [all] All right, sir!
-How does your Commandant look? -[all] All right, sir!
[Commandant] What is it that has brought this big family of strangers together?
translation.es: ¿Qué fue lo que unió a esta gran familia de desconocidos?

translation.en: We have to get revenge. Huh?
against the killings and rapings of our own people from the PLF
translation.es: de los asesinatos y violaciones contra nuestro pueblo del FLP

translation.en: and now from the NRC junta.
translation.es: y ahora, de la junta del CRN.

translation.en: But it has awakened a sleeping beast.
translation.es: Pero todo esto despertó a la bestia durmiente.

translation.en: It has put the weapons of this war back in the hands of you,
translation.es: Puso las armas de esta guerra en sus manos,

translation.en: the young and, therefore, the powerful.
translation.es: las de los jóvenes y, en consecuencia, los poderosos.

translation.en: We will not wait to inherit any wealth. Huh?
We will not wait for them to come and give it to us.
translation.es: No esperaremos que ellos vengan a dárnosla.

translation.en: [Commandant] We are going to take it.
[Commandant] We are going to take it. [all] Yes, sir!
-We're going to take it from them. -We're going to take it from them. -[all] Yes, sir!
All of you that have never been listened to before
translation.es: Todos los que nunca fueron escuchados

translation.en: and have seen your family killed, huh,
translation.es: y han visto cómo mataron a sus familias,

translation.en: you now have something that stands for you.
translation.es: ahora tienen algo que los defiende.

translation.en: You now have something that stands for you!
[Commandant] That is your family's blood. [all] Yes, sir!
translation.es: - ¡Es la sangre de sus familias! - ¡Sí, señor!

translation.en: -We are going to seize it! -We are going to seize it! -[all] Victory!
[Commandant speaking English] The spirits have blessed you...
To the enemy, you are invincible.
But there are rules we must follow...

translation.es: para mantener contentos a los espíritus,
¡El enemigo no los volverá a ver!

translation.en: You are fortified! You are fortified, eh?
Now it is time for war. We are warring.
translation.es: Es el momento de la guerra. Estamos en combate.

translation.en: but from here we are moving.
Moving forward. We are not to stay here.
Don't be leaving anything for the enemy to be using.
translation.es: No dejen nada que el enemigo pueda usar.

translation.en: We are going to burn it down.
-You are dismissed. -[soldier] Yes, sir. Thank you.
[Two-I-C] All of you, pack your weapons. Be ready to move.
translation.es: Todos guarden sus armas. Prepárense para avanzar.

translation.en: [Commandant] Ah-ha! Make sure this thing is burned.
[Two-I-C] Don't make me be waiting for you, soldiers!
We are leaving nothing for them to find.
translation.es: No dejemos nada que puedan encontrar.

translation.en: [Commandant] We are supplied and moving. Over.
Make sure all the guns are clean.
[Commandant] They have been buried for a long time.

translation.es: - Vean que funcionen. -Tomen suministros. Tracen victorias.

translation.en: This will keep the spirit up, despite the UN embargo.
translation.es: Así mantendremos la moral a pesar del embargo de la ONU.

translation.en: [Goodblood] Our fight is a just one.
Being a freedom fighter is discipline, obedience and loyalty.
translation.es: Luchar por la libertad requiere disciplina, obediencia y lealtad.

translation.en: We remain ever loyal to Supreme HQ, sir.
Standing by for future orders. Over.
translation.es: A la espera de órdenes futuras. Cambio.

translation.en: [Goodblood] Keep moving. Keep fighting. Over and out.
translation.es: Sigan moviéndose. Sigan peleando. Cambio y fuera.

translation.en: This here. This is the route where we are now.
translation.es: Es aquí. Esta es la ruta donde estamos.

translation.en: Listen. From here, we must go down.
And wait by that road there.
translation.es: Y esperar junto a ese camino.

translation.en: Because I think something is coming across there.
Hey! Why? Where do you go? Come over! Fuck! Fly!
[CO Hope] Preacher, give me the ganja.
[CO Hope] Agu, you know, ambush rule number one, no noise.
translation.es: Agu, la primera regla de toda emboscada es no hacer ruido.

translation.en: You keep quiet. Keep very quiet.
If even a snake bite your legs, you keep quiet.
translation.es: Si una serpiente te muerde las piernas, no hablas.

translation.en: You get hit, you keep quiet.
What is the rule number one in ambush?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es la primera regla de toda emboscada?

translation.en: No talking, even if snake is biting you.
translation.es: No hablar, aunque me muerda una serpiente.

translation.en: You talk, enemies come around, we all go die.
translation.es: Si hablas, los enemigos nos rodearán, y todos moriremos.

translation.en: They are coming. Everybody, be quiet. They are coming.
[soldier] Hey, you! Go! Cut them off!
Search this vehicle. Search all the vehicles.
translation.es: Revisen ese vehículo. Revisen todos los vehículos.

translation.en: I want this victory mapped. Map them. Map this victory.
translation.es: Quiero que tracen esta victoria. Revísenlos. Tracen la victoria.

translation.en: This vehicle, all the bodies, I want them pockets searched.
translation.es: Revisen todo este vehículo, los bolsillos de todos los cadáveres.

translation.en: All of it! Search them good-good.
Go and bring me my charge.
-Sir! I find this. -Why don't you open it?
translation.es: - ¡Señor! Hallé esto. - ¿Por qué no lo abres?

translation.en: Agu, you are going to kill this man.
[man stammers] Please. I'm supposed to be fixing the bridges.
translation.es: Por favor. Debería estar arreglando puentes.

translation.en: You are going to kill him today.
[man] I not be a soldier. Please, sir.
I'm an engineering student from the university in the capital.
translation.es: Soy estudiante de ingeniería de la universidad de la capital.

translation.en: I'm supposed to be fixing the bridges,
Pass me something for this guy.
-Nah, that's too big. -It will be cutlass.
Does he have strength for this?
Yeah, he is strong. You can do it. Preacher, put him on his ass.
translation.es: Sí, es fuerte. Puedes hacerlo. Preacher, siéntalo.

translation.en: -[man sobbing] -Put him on his ass! On his ass! Agu, come.
So when you are chopping wood, lift up high-high. Up, high.
translation.es: Cuando cortas madera, la levantas bien alto.

translation.en: Then when you are ready, you come down so well-well into the flesh.
translation.es: Cuando estés listo, clávalo en la carne.

translation.en: -You have chopped melon before? Melon? -Please, no.
translation.es: - ¿Has cortado un melón? - Por favor, no.

translation.en: -Well, this is not a melon. -Please, no.
translation.es: - No es un melón. - Por favor.

translation.en: I said shut your mouth, huh? Shut your mouth.
You are making it hard. This is hard.
translation.es: Lo estás haciendo difícil. Esto es duro.

translation.en: It's hard, so you must split him good.
translation.es: Es duro, así que debes partirlo bien.

translation.en: Huh? Agu, these are the ones that killed your father.
translation.es: Agu, estos son los que mataron a tu padre.

translation.en: [Commandant] These are the ones, the dogs that kill your father.
translation.es: Estos son los perros que mataron a tu padre.

translation.en: [Commandant] Agu, these are the ones that killed your father!
translation.es: Agu, ¡estos son los que mataron a tu padre!

translation.en: That is what you call justice. Hmm.
[Agu] God... I have killed a man.
it is the right thing to be doing.
translation.es: que es lo que hay que hacer.

translation.en: This will be the Commandant's car.
translation.es: Este será el auto del Comandante.

translation.en: Take this fucker out. He is filthy.
translation.es: Saca a este desgraciado. Está sucio.

translation.en: Give this to my charge. Huh?

translation.es: - Este será el auto del Comandante.

translation.en: -This will be the Commandant's car. -Yes, sir.
translation.es: - Este será el auto del Comandante. - Sí, señor.

translation.en: [Two-I-C] If you are losing it, then I am losing you.
-You are driving? -[Two-I-C] Okay to move out.
Everyone, get ready to move out.
You got this stuff from where?
Hey, I'm asking you a question, and you are not talking.
translation.es: Te hice una pregunta, y no hablas.

translation.en: I am thinking about my mom...
I am asking a question. You are not talking.
[boy 1] Where is he? [boy 2] Keep going, keep going.
[boy 3] Grass cutter! Grass cutter! Grass cutter!
[Commandant] And you're having any food that you want,
translation.es: Y comerán todo lo que quieran,

translation.en: from chicken, cow, fruit and vegetable...
translation.es: desde pollo, carne, frutas y vegetales.

translation.en: Any kind of fish that you want, we got. The fisherman is bringing it from the sea.
translation.es: Y también habrá todo tipo de pescado. Los pescadores los traen del mar.

translation.en: There's nothing you cannot have there.
translation.es: Ahí no hay nada que no puedan tener.

translation.en: And the best thing of this place, this town of abundant resources,
translation.es: Y lo mejor de este lugar, este pueblo de abundantes recursos,

translation.en: Hey, the women are too beautiful there! Too beautiful.
Ah! The next thing you know, your soldier will be standing to attention.
translation.es: Sin que se den cuenta, su soldadito estará listo para la batalla.

translation.en: They are having bottoms with specifications so nice
that the ground where they're sitting down is also rejoicing.
translation.es: que el suelo sobre el que se sientan también se regocija.

translation.en: And they know... they know how to be treating a man.
translation.es: Y ellas saben cómo tratar a un hombre.

translation.en: How to make him feel good, kisses and all that, huh?
translation.es: Cómo hacerlo sentir bien, besarlo y todo eso.

translation.en: Last time I was there, my soldier was hurting.
translation.es: La última vez que estuve ahí, me dolía mi soldadito.

translation.en: But you will see because you are going there yourselves.
translation.es: Pero lo verán por ustedes mismos, porque irán ahí.

translation.en: You will see with your own eyes, gentlemen.
translation.es: Lo verán con sus propios ojos, caballeros.

translation.en: -Who is this? -Refugees from the village, sir.
translation.es: - ¿Quiénes son? - Refugiados de la aldea, señor.

translation.en: They said the PLF and the NRC took their village three days ago.
translation.es: Dijeron que el FLP y el CRN tomaron su aldea hace tres días.

translation.en: They killed most of the town, but they let these ones go.
translation.es: Mataron a casi todos, pero a ellos los dejaron ir.

translation.en: Well, let us be giving their village back, huh?

translation.es: Le cortan las manos a la gente.

translation.en: Uh, we are facing heavy fire, sir. Over.
It's very difficult, sir. Men are fighting bravely,
translation.es: Es muy difícil. Los hombres luchan con valentía,

translation.en: but I don't know if we can hold too much longer. Over.
translation.es: pero no sé si podremos aguantar mucho más. Cambio.

translation.en: [Commandant] Press on! [Two-I-C] Roger. We need support, sir.
Some of our men are injured.
The men's spirits are low. Sir, do you copy?
translation.es: La moral está muy baja. Señor, ¿me copia?

translation.en: Copy, sir. We will reapply pressure and push for the bridge. Over.
translation.es: Copiado, señor. Presionaremos más para tomar el puente. Cambio.

translation.en: See this thing, huh? This is a very special device.
translation.es: ¿Ven esto? Es un dispositivo muy especial.

translation.en: We can be seeing the enemy even when the enemy is hiding.
translation.es: Podemos ver al enemigo aun cuando se esconde.

translation.en: Ah! There you go. See our guys. Look, we are taking them.
translation.es: Eso es. Ahí están los nuestros. Mira, los estamos rodeando.

translation.en: We want to take that bridge.
Now we are going to take that bridge.
translation.es: Ahora vamos a tomar el puente.

translation.en: [Commandant] That bridge, we are taking it!
[Commandant] Better look me in the eyes, motherfucker.
translation.es: Mírame a los ojos, hijo de puta.

translation.en: -Are you ready to fight? -[all] Yes, sir!
-Are you ready to fight? -[all] Yes, sir!
-You want to take that bridge? -[all] Yes, sir!
-We're gonna take that fucking bridge? -[all] Yes, sir!
-[shouting in English] No retreat! -[all yelling] No surrender!
[Preacher] Our Father, from dust we were created. We shall go back to dust.
translation.es: Padre Nuestro, del polvo fuimos creados. Al polvo volveremos.

translation.en: [Two-I-C] I commit my fellow soldiers into your hands.
translation.es: En tus manos encomiendo a mis compañeros soldados.

translation.en: May their soul rest in peace. Amen.
translation.es: Que sus almas descansen en paz. Amén.

translation.en: [Agu] I am now knowing the smell of the dead.
translation.es: Ahora conozco el olor de los muertos.
Es dulce como la caña de azúcar
y putrefacto como vino de palma.

translation.en: And when they stay in the sun, they are growing plump like brown mangoes.
translation.es: Y si permanecen al sol, se hinchan como la mangosta.

translation.en: [Goodblood on radio] You have your next mission. Stand by.
[Goodblood] Capture the central regions, capital city, Bov.
translation.es: Capturen las regiones centrales, la capital, Bov.

translation.en: I will promulgate an order making you Brigadier General.
translation.es: emitiré una orden que te ascienda a Brigadier General.

translation.en: You'll be a general before we finally seize the capital city.
translation.es: Serás General antes de que por fin tomemos la capital.

translation.en: [Commandant] Yes, sir. It is a challenge, sir.
translation.es: Sí, señor. Es un reto, señor.

translation.en: But I promise you, it's mission possible. Over.
translation.es: Pero le prometo que haremos posible esa misión. Cambio.

translation.en: [Goodblood] Well, then, next time I see you, I'll be speaking to a general.
translation.es: La próxima vez que te vea, me dirigiré a ti como General.

translation.en: And how is your Two-I-C performing? Over.
Two-I-C? Sorry, sir. What do you mean "Two-I-C"?
translation.es: ¿El Lugarteniente? Perdón, señor. ¿A qué se refiere?

translation.en: [Goodblood] I've always rated that young man.
translation.es: Siempre tuve fe en ese joven.

translation.en: Well, Two-I-C is a formidable soldier.
translation.es: El Lugarteniente es un soldado formidable.

translation.en: [Goodblood] Teach him the ways of a good commander.
translation.es: - Enséñale cómo ser un buen comandante.
- Enséñale cómo ser un buen comandante. - Sí, señor.

translation.en: [Goodblood] Now, take Bov. Keep that spirit up, and bring us closer to victory.
translation.es: Tomen a Bov. Mantengan alta la moral, y acérquennos a la victoria.

translation.en: [Goodblood] You want to be a general, don't you, Commandant?

translation.es: - Sí, señor. - Gánatelo. Cambio y fuera.

translation.en: -Agu, you fought well today. -Thank you, sir.
translation.es: - Agu, hoy peleaste bien. - Gracias, señor.

translation.en: Agu, you are wanting to be knowing how to be leading?
-I am happy to be following you, sir.
translation.es: - Me alegra seguir sus órdenes, señor.

translation.en: -I am happy to be following you, sir. -That is good,
translation.es: - Me alegra seguir sus órdenes, señor. - Eso es bueno,

translation.en: because there is no learning how to be leading.
translation.es: porque no se aprende a liderar.

translation.en: Some people are born to be leaders, others are born to be followers,
translation.es: Algunos nacen para ser líderes, otros, para seguir órdenes,

translation.en: and others are just waiting to be dying.
-I'm a good follower, sir. -Agu, you are different.
translation.es: - Soy bueno obedeciendo, señor. - Agu, tú eres distinto.

translation.en: You are reminding me of when I was a small boy.
translation.es: Me recuerdas a mí cuando era niño.

translation.en: That is how I know you are going to be a leader.
translation.es: Por eso sé que vas a ser un líder.

translation.en: You see, even the best leader
sometimes he must be knowing how to be a follower.
translation.es: a veces debe saber cómo obedecer órdenes.

translation.en: I am following the Supreme Commandant, even if I am not agreeing.
translation.es: Sigo al Comandante Supremo, aunque no esté de acuerdo.

translation.en: Yes, sir. I'm a good follower.
The Commandant is saying we must take this.
translation.es: El Comandante dice que debemos tomarlo.

translation.en: So, hmm, if it is important to him, it is important to me.
translation.es: Así que si es importante para él, es importante para mí.

translation.en: Because if we get that, then we can go to Taro.
translation.es: Porque si lo tomamos, podremos ir a Taro.

translation.en: -That is where your mother is, eh?
-That is where your mother is, eh? -She is in the capital.
translation.es: - Ahí está tu madre, ¿no? - Está en la capital.

translation.en: After we've been greeted by Dada Goodblood,
translation.es: Después de que Dada Goodblood nos reciba,

translation.en: we'll be taking the capital certainly.
You see, I've been wanting to help you more than the others, Agu,
translation.es: He querido ayudarte más que a los demás, Agu,

translation.en: but you cannot be telling the others how I'm helping you like this.
translation.es: pero no puedes contarles cómo te estoy ayudando.

translation.en: It'll have to be our secret.
-You are knowing how to keep secret?
-You are knowing how to keep secret? -Yes, sir.
-Well, be saying it. -I can be keeping this secret, sir.
translation.es: - Bueno, dilo. - Sé guardar un secreto, señor.

translation.en: I'm not punishing you, Agu. Mmm?
But I do care for you.
Be doing this thing... for me.
-[chickens clucking] -[boy 1] They are jumping like rabbits.
-Go, go. Keep going. -[boy 1] Go. Keep going.
I don't want that I call you and you just stand there. Agu?
translation.es: No quiero llamarte y que te quedes ahí parado. ¿Agu?

translation.en: Come here, I'll give you some brown-brown.
It'll cure everything for you, eh.
Hey, I didn't call you to stand there.
translation.es: No te llamé para que te quedaras ahí parado.

translation.en: My boy, what is wrong with you? What is wrong with you?
Come here, I'll give you some morale booster.
translation.es: Ven aquí, te daré algo para subirte la moral.

translation.en: I think I'll give you that brown-brown, so...
Morale booster, you know. Come, come. Here.
translation.es: Para subirte la moral. Ven. Toma.

translation.en: [Commandant] Nobody is your friend where we are going.
They are the farmers that have fed the enemy.
translation.es: Son granjeros que han alimentado al enemigo.

translation.en: -The farmers' wives whose breasts... -[Preacher] Agu. Agu. ...have been feeding babies.
translation.es: Las esposas de los granjeros cuyos senos han alimentado bebés.

translation.en: [Commandant] That is the nature of the land that we are going.
translation.es: Esa es la naturaleza de la tierra a la que iremos.

translation.en: Our people's blood has been flowing for years.
translation.es: La sangre de nuestro pueblo ha corrido durante años.

translation.en: That's why it is time for their blood to flow.
translation.es: Por eso es hora de que corra la sangre de ellos.
No le perdonaremos la vida a nadie.
No le perdonaremos la vida a nadie,

translation.en: because they are all enemy, all of them!
He is guiding us with what we are about to be doing.
translation.es: Guíanos en lo que vamos a hacer.

translation.en: God, we will be sacrificing our blood!
That is why we must spare nobody!
translation.es: Por eso, ¡no dejaremos a nadie con vida!

translation.en: Because we are invincible. We are invincible!
[Commandant shouting in English] NDF, spare nobody!
translation.es: FDN, ¡no dejen a nadie con vida!

translation.en: Come on, move, NDF! Move, move! Move!
[soldier] How the Commandant look? [all] All right, sir!
-I say, how the Commandant look? -[all] All right, sir!
Leave this one under my charge.
translation.es: Dejen a este bajo mi mando.

translation.en: I will be training him to be a warrior.
[CO Hope in English] Move, move! Move, move, move! Move!
-[Preacher] Fuck you! Fucker! Fucker! -[Preacher] Fuck you! Fucker! Fucker! -[people screaming]
-[Agu] Fuck, fuck, fuck! -[Agu] Fuck, fuck, fuck! -[gun firing]
-Out, out. Over here. -[woman and little girl screaming] Fucking out! Fucking out! Out!
Fucking out! Out! Get up! Get up, fuck! Get up! Up!
[CO Hope speaking English] What the fuck going on here?
[speaking native language] I was looking for you!
[CO Hope speaking English] Where do you know this woman from? You know her?
translation.es: ¿De dónde conoces a esta mujer? ¿La conoces?

translation.en: [speaking native language] I was looking for you!
[speaking native language] You're not my mother!
You're not my mother! You fooled me!
[Agu in English] God... are you watching what we are doing?
You didn't fucking boy, eh? You didn't fucking, boy.
translation.es: ¿No te la cogiste, niño? No te la cogiste.
Viniste a morir, hijo de puta.

translation.en: Fuck him up, eh? Fuck you up. Fuck you up.
[soldier] Commandant, sir. This is for you, sir.
translation.es: Comandante, señor. Esto es para usted, señor.

translation.en: [Two-I-C] From the Supreme Commander. What does it say?
Now it is your turn to eat.
translation.es: Ahora es su turno de comer.

translation.en: -Are we going to Taro? -Are we going to Taro? -[explosion]
What is happening to this one?
A piece of RPG is hitting his temple.
translation.es: Un trozo de granada lo golpeó en la sien.

translation.en: [woman] I beg you, please, don't shoot me! Please!
-[soldier] Hey, keep your eyes down! -[soldier] Hey, keep your eyes down! -[Commandant] Oi! Oi! Oi!
[Two-I-C] What do we do with the civilians?
translation.es: ¿Qué hacemos con los civiles? NOS TOCA COMER

translation.en: Send him up north to the next village and then the next village after that.
translation.es: Envíenlo al norte, a la próxima aldea, y luego a la aldea que sigue.

translation.en: Tell them that we are coming. It's only the beginning.
translation.es: Que les avise que iremos. Es solo el comienzo.

translation.en: Take note and act accordingly. Strika and Agu are now part of my squad.
translation.es: Toma nota y actúa en consecuencia. Strika y Agu son parte de mi escuadrón.
Vista desde la Montaña. Chaqueta de Hierro. Cambio.

translation.en: [soldier] We are proceeding to Taro with arms. Over!
What kind of welcome is this?
Sorry, sir. You, get in that car. Take them to HQ.
translation.es: Perdón, señor. Tú, sube al auto. Llévalos al cuartel general.

translation.en: Right this way. Right this way.
Weapons are not allowed in here. So you place them here.
translation.es: Aquí no se permiten armas. Déjenlas aquí.

translation.en: You wait here. Here. Have a seat.
And you will bring us water?
Goodblood says this is a token of appreciation--
translation.es: Goodblood dice que es una muestra de su gratitud.

translation.en: I'm sorry. The Supreme Commander is so very upset to keep you waiting.
translation.es: Lo siento. El Comandante Supremo se siente muy mal por hacerlos esperar.

translation.en: -What is this? -He'll be with you shortly.
translation.es: - ¿Qué es esto? - Vendrá en un momento.

translation.en: I would like you to know we also offered rations and water
translation.es: Quiero que sepa que también ofrecimos raciones y agua

translation.en: to the rest of your battalion this morning.
translation.es: al resto de su batallón esta mañana.

translation.en: It looks like your family has grown.
translation.es: Parece que tu familia ha crecido.

translation.en: They must eat while we talk, unless you are hungry, too.
translation.es: Deben comer mientras hablamos, salvo que tú también tengas hambre.

translation.en: I'm not hungry. Two-I-C, take them and go and eat.
translation.es: No tengo hambre. Lugarteniente, vayan a comer.

translation.en: [Preacher] Lot of food over here. Let's eat, man!
You are leading me to believe we are changing objectives.
translation.es: Me hace creer que cambiaremos de objetivo.

translation.en: Are we not taking the capital anymore?
Chief, to protect our people, the time is now.
translation.es: Jefe, ha llegado la hora de proteger a nuestro pueblo.

translation.en: If we have the momentum and we have the power, why wait?
translation.es: Tenemos el ímpetu y tenemos el poder, ¿por qué esperar?

translation.en: You are not the political voice of this movement, Commandant. I am.
translation.es: Ud. no es la voz política de este movimiento, Comandante. Yo sí.

translation.en: Protecting our people remains the priority.
translation.es: La prioridad sigue siendo proteger a nuestro pueblo.

translation.en: But as you know, the world is becoming aware of this war now.
translation.es: Pero como sabrá, el mundo ahora sabe sobre esta guerra.

translation.en: No one will escape judgment when it is over.
translation.es: Nadie escapará al juzgamiento cuando termine.

translation.en: And the decisions we make have far deeper consequences.
translation.es: Y las decisiones que tomemos tendrán consecuencias aún más graves.

translation.en: And what decisions have you made... for my battalion?
translation.es: ¿Y qué decisiones ha tomado para mi batallón?

translation.en: Are you not making me general?
I'm giving your battalion to Two-I-C, Commandant.
translation.es: Le daré su batallón al Lugarteniente, Comandante.

translation.en: That is why I brought you here.
And you, I will promote to Deputy Chief of Security,
translation.es: Y a usted lo ascenderé a Subjefe de Seguridad,

translation.en: I hope you accept and act accordingly.
translation.es: Espero que acepte y actúe en consecuencia.

translation.en: Thank you, sir. I promise to fulfill my duty to the fullest--
translation.es: Gracias, señor. Prometo cumplir con mi deber...

translation.en: This, my battalion... that I have made with my own hands.
translation.es: Este es mi batallón, lo creé con mis propias manos.

translation.en: Your battalion is my battalion, Commandant,
translation.es: Su batallón es mi batallón, Comandante,

translation.en: as are hundreds of others across this nation.
translation.es: al igual que cientos de otros en todo el país.

translation.en: I want the ceremony of changeover tomorrow,
translation.es: La ceremonia de cambio de mando será mañana,

translation.en: so that Two-I-C can take the battalion back out for battle.
translation.es: y el Lugarteniente llevará al batallón de vuelta a la batalla.

translation.en: As you know, and with thanks to you, we have the NRC on their heels
translation.es: Como sabrá, y gracias a usted, le pisamos los talones al CRN,

translation.en: with the help and support of the UN and ECOMOD.
translation.es: con la ayuda y el apoyo de la ONU y ECOMOD.

translation.en: It has now become a battle for public image.
translation.es: Ahora se ha convertido en una batalla por la imagen pública.

translation.en: And what of my payment? Hmm?
What share of the resources will I be seeing?
translation.es: ¿Qué parte de los recursos me tocará?

translation.en: Do not forget you are a soldier.
translation.es: No olvide que es un soldado.

translation.en: Your most important duty is obedience.
Your third duty is obedience. Everything is obedience.
translation.es: Su tercer deber es obedecer. Todo es obediencia.

translation.en: I will have one more night... with my men.
translation.es: Pasaré una noche más con mis hombres.

translation.en: Assemble the COs and the troops and bivouac outside of town.
translation.es: Reúne a los oficiales y las tropas y acampen fuera de la ciudad.

translation.en: I'm taking Two-I-C and the boys to all celebrate tonight.
translation.es: Me llevaré al Lugarteniente y a los niños a celebrar esta noche.

translation.en: And if you and Strika are my bodyguards, and I am going, then you are also going.
translation.es: Y si tú y Strika son mis guardaespaldas, donde yo vaya, ustedes irán.

translation.en: [Commandant] Yeah, make 'em bring something for my soldiers.
translation.es: Sí, que traigan algo para mis soldados.

translation.en: [Madam] Okay. [Commandant] And my own soldier. [Madam] Hey, hey...
translation.es: - Está bien. - Y para mi propio soldado.

translation.en: Bring beer. Bring soda. Bring whatever you have.
translation.es: Traigan cerveza. Traigan refrescos. Traigan lo que tengan.

translation.en: Can't you see we have guests? Hurry!
because we will drink it whether it's hot or it's cold.
translation.es: porque la beberemos aunque esté fría o caliente.

translation.en: I need to be checking on the others--
You will be staying here so we can celebrate you.
translation.es: Nos quedaremos aquí para celebrar tu ascenso.

translation.en: In fact, Mama, I want you to bring a special one for my Two-I-C,
translation.es: De hecho, Madre, quiero que traigas a una especial para el Lugarteniente,

translation.en: who will soon be the Commandant.
[Commandant] Hmm. But you have one special for Two-I-C.
translation.es: Pero tráele una especial al Lugarteniente.

translation.en: Hey, Mama, this one has fresh papaya.
translation.es: Madre, esta tiene la papaya fresca.

translation.en: If it is women you wanting, I get plenty from backyard.
translation.es: Si quieres mujeres, tengo muchas atrás.

translation.en: Just bring me my own. You know my specifications.
translation.es: Solo tráeme la mía. Conoces mis gustos.

translation.en: See this little yeah-yeah boy born yesterday.
translation.es: Este niñito parece que nació ayer.

translation.en: [Commandant] Don't mind him. Don't mind him.
-Where are the girls? -[Madam] They are coming.
We've got enough girls for the men, but no more for the little boys.
translation.es: Tenemos suficientes chicas para los hombres, pero no para los niños.

translation.en: Look at you. Look at you.
[Commandant] You are looking very hot. [woman] Yeah, I miss you.
translation.es: - Estás muy sexy. - Sí, te extrañé.

translation.en: -[Commandant] Oh, you miss me. Really? -[Commandant] Oh, you miss me. Really? -Mmm-hmm.
Don't be watching your Commandant because you can't have what I'm having.
translation.es: No mires a tu comandante, porque no podrás tener lo mismo que yo.

translation.en: What happened to my man? What happened here?
translation.es: ¿Qué le pasó a mi hombre? ¿Qué pasó aquí?

translation.en: I was just playing with his gun and it just went off.
translation.es: Solo jugaba con su arma y se disparó.

translation.en: -I don't know what happened. I'm sorry.
-I don't know what happened. I'm sorry. -[Two-I-C] You did this.
translation.es: - No sé qué pasó. Perdón. - Tú lo hiciste.
- Tú lo hiciste. - Tú lo hiciste. - ¡Tranquilo!

translation.en: You did this! You did this!
-You thought you were shooting me! -No, no, no!
-You thought it was me? -I didn't mean to. I'm so sorry.
translation.es: - ¿Creíste que era yo? - No fue mi intención.

translation.en: Were you trying to kill me and you kill my soldier?
translation.es: ¿Querías matarme a mí y a mi soldado?

translation.en: It was an accident! No! Not me--
Pick him up! Pick him up! Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Pick him up! I want you to take all their women!
-[Preacher] Move! Move! Move! Move! -All of them!
[Preacher] Move! [Commandant] Let's go! Let's go! Move!
[man 1 on radio] All call signs, all call signs, anyone have eyes on Iron Jacket?
translation.es: Todas las unidades, ¿alguien ha visto a Chaqueta de Hierro?

translation.en: All call signs report visual of Iron Jacket. Over.
translation.es: Informen si han visto a Chaqueta de Hierro. Cambio.

translation.en: [man 2 on radio] Mountain View, Z Fire. Did not copy. Over.
translation.es: Vista desde la montaña, Fuego Z. No lo copio. Cambio.

translation.en: [man 1] All call signs, report visual on Iron Jacket.
translation.es: Informe visual de Chaqueta de Hierro a todas las unidades.

translation.en: Any knowledge on the location or movement of Iron Jacket? Over.
translation.es: ¿Algún dato sobre la ubicación o movimiento de Chaqueta de Hierro? Cambio.

translation.en: I repeat, no visual of Iron Jacket. Over.
translation.es: Repito, no vemos a Chaqueta de Hierro. Cambio.

translation.en: [man 3 on radio] Mountain View. Two-two. Copy same. No visual on Iron Jacket.
translation.es: Vista desde la Montaña. Dos-Dos. Copiado. No vemos a Chaqueta de Hierro.

translation.en: [man 4 on radio] Mountain View. Black Sand.
translation.es: Vista desde la Montaña. Arena Negra.

translation.en: Report, Iron Jacket moved out from our checkpoint yesterday. Over.
translation.es: Chaqueta de Hierro se desplazó ayer de nuestro punto de control. Cambio.
Arena Negra. Vista desde la Montaña. ¿Chaqueta de Hierro pasó por su sector? Cambio.

translation.en: Iron Jacket moved through your sector? Over.
translation.es: ¿Chaqueta de Hierro pasó por su sector? Cambio.

translation.en: [man 4 on radio] Mountain View, Black Sand, Roger.
translation.es: Vista desde la montaña, Arena Negra, copiado.

translation.en: Iron Jacket battalion moved out with orders for battle. Over.
translation.es: El batallón de Chaqueta de Hierro se fue con órdenes de batalla. Cambio.

translation.en: [man 1] Iron Jacket, this is Mountain View.
translation.es: Chaqueta de Hierro, aquí Vista desde la Montaña...
- Chaqueta de Hierro, ¿dónde está? - Sí, señor.

translation.en: -Come and sit with me. -[man 1] Iron Jacket, do you copy? Over.
translation.es: - Ven a sentarte conmigo. - Chaqueta de Hierro, ¿me copia? Cambio.

translation.en: Iron Jacket, you are disobeying a direct--
translation.es: Chaqueta de Hierro, desobedece una orden directa...

translation.en: Agu, these are very dangerous times.
translation.es: Agu, es una época muy peligrosa.

translation.en: Never know who you could be trusting.
translation.es: Nunca se sabe en quién confiar.

translation.en: That is why it is good to always sleep one eye open.
translation.es: Por eso es bueno dormir siempre con un ojo abierto.

translation.en: That is why I have you and I have Strika.
translation.es: Por eso los tengo a ti y a Strika.

translation.en: Agu, sometimes I'm feeling sorry for you.
translation.es: Agu, a veces siento pena por ti.

translation.en: [soldiers] ♪ God, bless the man who died ♪
translation.es: Dios, bendice al hombre que murió
En el gran frente de batalla

translation.en: ♪ For the sake of the NDF ♪
translation.es: Por el bien de las FDN

translation.en: ♪ God, bless the man who died ♪
translation.es: Dios, bendice al hombre que murió

translation.en: Our Father, today we lost our fellow soldier.
translation.es: Padre Nuestro, hoy perdimos a un compañero soldado.

translation.en: Guide him forever and ever. Amen.
translation.es: Guíalo por los siglos de los siglos. Amén.
Esto no fue obra de Dios.
El Comandante Supremo era nuestro amigo.

translation.en: But we are not fearing change, for we are strong!
translation.es: ¡Pero no le tememos al cambio, porque nos sentimos fuertes!

translation.en: That is why we should be taking our own territory...
translation.es: Por eso deberíamos tomar nuestro propio territorio

translation.en: [Agu] We are leaving Two-I-C to be eaten by gogomi and worms.
translation.es: Dejamos al Lugarteniente para que sea devorado por gogomi y gusanos.

translation.en: "The only way not to be fighting anymore is to be dying."
translation.es: La muerte es el único modo de no luchar más.

translation.en: [Agu] People are dying just like this every day.
translation.es: La gente muere así todos los días.

translation.en: Every person I am knowing is dying.
"If this war is ever ending, I cannot be going back to doing child things."
translation.es: Si esta guerra termina algún día, no puedo volver a hacer cosas de niños.
Las hojas, los árboles, el suelo, la persona.

translation.en: Just making person to bleed everywhere.
translation.es: Hacen que las personas sangren por todas partes.

translation.en: We are just like wild animals now with no place to be going.
translation.es: Somos como animales salvajes, deambulando sin rumbo.

translation.en: why are you shining on this world?
I am wanting to catch you in my hands,
to squeeze you until you cannot shine no more.
translation.es: apretarte hasta que ya no brilles más.

translation.en: That way, everything is always dark
translation.es: De ese modo, todo será oscuridad,

translation.en: and nobody's ever having to see
all the terrible things that are happening here.
translation.es: las cosas terribles que suceden aquí.

translation.en: Stand up and let's go! We are going.
I am wanting to say to Strika, "I am tired, too."
translation.es: Quiero decirle a Strika: Yo también estoy cansado.

translation.en: and so the words are not coming out of my mouth.
translation.es: y las palabras no salen de mi boca.

translation.en: A song, just like my mother sang.
translation.es: Una canción, como la cantaba mi madre.
Vete al carajo. La vida es triste.

translation.en: Go get me some fucking bullets to be shooting right now. Move!
translation.es: Consígueme balas para disparar ya mismo. ¡Deprisa!

translation.en: I can only be talking to you now because God is not listening.
translation.es: Ahora solo puedo hablarte a ti porque Dios no me escucha.

translation.en: Your song is making my body to move,
translation.es: Tu canción hace que mi cuerpo se mueva

translation.en: and I am not having to think anymore.
translation.es: y ya no tenga que pensar.

translation.en: Not about Strika, not about this war,
translation.es: Ni en Strika, ni en esta guerra,

translation.en: not about any of the things that are jumping into my head.
translation.es: ni en las cosas que me vienen a la cabeza.

translation.en: I am wanting to lie down on the warm ground
translation.es: Solo quiero recostarme sobre tierra cálida,

translation.en: with my eyes closed and the smell of mud in my nose.
translation.es: cerrar los ojos y oler el aroma del lodo.

translation.en: It wasn't supposed to be the way that it has turned out to be.
translation.es: Se suponía que las cosas serían diferentes.

translation.en: But you, I will always protect you, Agu, because you are my son...
translation.es: Pero a ti siempre te protegeré, Agu, porque eres mi hijo,

translation.en: and a son always protects a father.
translation.es: y un hijo siempre protege a su padre.

translation.en: Commandant, I want to talk to you, sir.
Two-I-C, go back to your post.
No, sir. We are going, sir.
You are the only one standing in front of me, stupid.
translation.es: Eres el único parado frente a mí, estúpido.

translation.en: I am going, sir. No bullets. What am I going to use to shoot my enemy?
translation.es: Me voy, señor. No hay balas. ¿Qué usaré para dispararle al enemigo?

translation.en: We have been here for months now.

translation.es: No hay oro en las minas.

translation.en: No money, no food, no water.
translation.es: No hay dinero ni comida ni agua.

translation.en: People sick here and dying every day.
translation.es: La gente enferma aquí y muere todos los días.

translation.en: Who want to stay here and die?
[soldier 1] I want to go! [soldier 2] I want to going!
Who want to stay here and die?
Me, too. I want to go, sir!
[Preacher] Who want to stay here and die?
-Nobody want to stay here, sir! -We want to go, sir.
translation.es: - ¡Nadie quiere quedarse, señor! - Queremos irnos, señor.

translation.en: Then come and tell him how you feel.
Come and tell him how much we are suffering here.
translation.es: Vengan y díganle cuánto estamos sufriendo aquí.

translation.en: So, you... you are the big man now, huh?
Where will you be going? Huh?
Will you surrender to the other NDF camp?
translation.es: ¿Se rendirán en el campamento de las otras FDN?

translation.en: That might be better, but what next?
translation.es: Puede que sean mejores, pero ¿qué sigue?

translation.en: You think you can just go and do what you want in peace?
translation.es: ¿Creen que pueden simplemente irse y hacer lo que quieran en paz?

translation.en: You will go back to your village
and your family will not associate themselves with you.
translation.es: y sus familias no querrán tener nada que ver con ustedes.

translation.en: You and your uneducated, poor mind, you'll be nothing.
translation.es: Ustedes y su pobre mente sin educación no serán nada.

translation.en: Nobody will care for you. Huh?
And you will wake up and you will rise and see the sunrise and see the sunset,
translation.es: Despertarán, se levantarán y verán el amanecer y el anochecer,

translation.en: and you can just wait all day, all day,
with thousands of men just like you, waiting for somebody to give you a job.
translation.es: con miles de hombres como ustedes, esperando que alguien les dé un empleo.

translation.en: That is what you want to go and do?
How are you going to shoot me if you don't have bullets?
translation.es: ¿Cómo vas a dispararme si no tienes balas?

translation.en: Hey, Agu, I want you to kill Commandant. Come.
translation.es: Agu, quiero que mates al Comandante. Ven.

translation.en: Come, Agu, come. Put it here. Here!
Just remember, when you are all poor and hungry
translation.es: Solo recuerden que cuando sean pobres y tengan hambre,

translation.en: [soldier] Yes, sir! [Preacher] Come on, let's go.
And know that I will be calling for you one day.
translation.es: Y sepan que un día los llamaré.

translation.en: Go and drink gunpowder tea and playing draughts.
translation.es: Vayan a beber té verde y a jugar a las damas.

translation.en: No, no, no. You remember me. You remember your Commandant.
translation.es: No. Me recordarán. Recordarán a su Comandante.

translation.en: Remember, I will call for you again...
translation.es: Recuerda que te volveré a llamar,

translation.en: They will just lock you up in jail! You are stupid!
translation.es: ¡Los encerrarán en la cárcel! ¡Ustedes son estúpidos!

translation.en: the other ones, they'll come eat you.
Just chop for you... [stammering] your heart.
translation.es: A cortarlos en trozos, a comer su corazón.

translation.en: Agu, you stay here because they don't...
translation.es: Agu, quédate aquí porque ellos no...

translation.en: [soldier] And what is your mission here?
Raise up your arms! All weapons in the air!
Now turn and face the bush!
Don't look at my face! Put your weapons on the ground!
translation.es: ¡No me miren a la cara! ¡Dejen las armas en el suelo!

translation.en: Hands up! Sit on the floor!
Put your hands on your head!
[Father Friday] Agu, how are you settling in?
We are all here to help you.
[Agu] I am not knowing how long I am staying here...
translation.es: No sé cuánto tiempo me quedaré aquí,

translation.en: but I'm staying here for a long time.
translation.es: pero me quedaré un largo tiempo.

translation.en: Some week, some month, I am not knowing.
All I am knowing is how it is feeling here.
translation.es: Solo sé cómo me siento aquí.

translation.en: I am knowing the sound of people screaming and the smell of dead bodies...
translation.es: Conozco el sonido de los gritos de la gente y el olor de los cadáveres,

translation.en: and I am knowing the feeling of the brown-brown and djamba in my blood.
translation.es: y conozco la sensación de la cocaína que se mete en mi sangre.

translation.en: No, they are giving us poison there!
-They want us to die! -[Father Friday] Calm!
[Agu] Preacher is tiring of this place.
translation.es: Preacher se está cansando de este lugar.

translation.en: He's saying, "The war is not over,
and they are needing fighters like us."
We need money for here. We need money. Eh?
You can't stay here without money.
translation.es: No puedes quedarte aquí sin dinero.
lo único que sabemos es pelear.

translation.en: Have you forgotten? We have food to eat.
You NRC soldier, with the talk, you talk too much.
translation.es: Tú, soldado de la CRN, hablas demasiado.

translation.en: Agu, I can't stay here. I'm leaving.
translation.es: Agu, no puedo quedarme aquí. Me voy.

translation.en: Randy, don't go into the bush again.
translation.es: Randy, no vuelvas a la maleza.

translation.en: I don't like when you look into my eyes.
translation.es: No me gusta cuando me miras a los ojos.

translation.en: So if I look at a table, how can I talk to you?
translation.es: Si miro a la mesa, ¿cómo puedo hablarte?

translation.en: She thinks that my no speaking
is because I can't be explaining myself like baby,
translation.es: porque no puedo hacerme entender como un bebé,

translation.en: but I am not like baby.
I am like old man and she's like small girl
translation.es: Soy como un anciano, y ella es como una niña,

translation.en: because I am fighting in war and she's not even knowing what war is.
translation.es: porque yo he peleado en la guerra, y ella ni siquiera sabe cómo es.

translation.en: Try to talk to me about some of your experiences...
or try to tell me what you are thinking.
translation.es: o intenta contarme qué estás pensando.

translation.en: So how do you see your future?
I think if you talk to me about it, it will make you feel better.
translation.es: Si me hablas sobre eso, te sentirás mejor.

translation.en: So if I'm talking to you,
it will make me sad... and it will make you, too, sad.
translation.es: me pondré triste, y tú también te pondrás triste.

translation.en: I just want to be happy in this life.
If I'm telling this to you...
I am some sort of beast...
translation.es: que soy una especie de bestia

translation.en: I am all of these things...
